1.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone - Part 1
1.plot: Hosted by Nerdist's Rachel Heine, Geek & Sundry's Hector Navarro, and Geekbomb's Maude Garrett, Alpha Book Club is a weekly live show where the chosen book of the month is discussed with you, the readers! You can join in the conversation in the chat, dial in to video chat with the hosts directly, and even vote on which book you'd like to read next!

2.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone - Part 2
2.plot: Hosted by Nerdist's Rachel Heine, Geek & Sundry's Hector Navarro, and Geekbomb's Maude Garrett, Alpha Book Club is a weekly live show where the chosen book of the month is discussed with you, the readers! You can join in the conversation in the chat, dial in to video chat with the hosts directly, and even vote on which book you'd like to read next!

You can join in the conversation in the chat, dial in to video chat with the hosts directly, and even vote on which book you'd like to read next!

You can join in the conversation in the chat, dial in to video chat with the hosts directly, and even vote on which book you'd like to read next!

5.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone - Part 5
5.plot: Hosted by Nerdist's Rachel Heine, Geek & Sundry's Hector Navarro, and Geekbomb's Maude Garrett, Alpha Book Club is a weekly live show where the chosen book of the month is discussed with you, the readers! You can join in the conversation in the chat, dial in to video chat with the hosts directly, and even vote on which book you'd like to read next!

6.title: Interview with the Vampire - Part 1
6.plot: Hosts Maude Garrett, Rachel Heine, and Hector Navarro sink their teeth into the first 80 pages of Interview with the Vampire.

7.title: Interview with the Vampire - Part 2
7.plot: Amy Vorpahl and Erin Vail join host Maude Garrett as they discuss up to Part II in Interview with the Vampire.

8.title: Interview with the Vampire - Part 3
8.plot: Maude Garrett, Hector Navarro, and Amy Vorpahl explore Louis' journey to Europe as they cover up to page 247.

10.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - Part 1
10.plot: Take a handful of Floo powder and say Alpha Book Club very clearly as Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro return to Hogwarts for Harry's second year and cover chapters 1-5 in Chamber of Secrets.

11.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - Part 2
11.plot: Maude Garrett, Amy Vorpahl, and Hector Navarro continue Harry's adventures at Hogwarts as they cover chapters 6-10.

12.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - Part 3
12.plot: Hosts Rachel Heine, Amy Vorpahl, and Hector Navarro try some Polyjuice Potion as they cover chapters 11-15 in Chamber of Secrets.

13.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - Part 4
13.plot: Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro brave the Chamber of Secrets as they finish Harry's second year at Hogwarts.

14.title: The Golden Compass - Part 1
14.plot: Finally, Alpha Book Club is reading The Golden Compass. Hosts Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro start the journey into the His Dark Materials series by covering chapters 1-5.

15.title: The Golden Compass - Part 2
15.plot: Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro cover chapters 6-10 of The Golden Compass and learn who Lyra's parents are.

16.title: The Golden Compass - Part 3
16.plot: Amy Ratcliffe joins hosts Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro as they continue their adventures north in The Golden Compass. This week, book club covered chapters 11-17 and Hector tries out his Texian accent.

17.title: The Golden Compass - Part 4
17.plot: Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro explore the wilds of the north as they finish The Golden Compass.

18.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - Part 1
18.plot: Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro unpack their robes and wands as they head back into the wizarding world of Harry Potter and cover chapters 1-5 of Prisoner of Azkaban.

19.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - Part 2
19.plot: Hosts Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro learn about the Marauder's Map, compare Hogwarts professors to teachers in real life, and tell share what fearful shape a boggart would take.

20.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - Part 3
20.plot: Rachel Heine, Hector Navarro, and Amy Vorpahl learn the power of the Patronus charm and explore their happiest memories as they cover chapters 12-16 of Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban.

21.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - Part 4
21.plot: Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro explore how Harry Potter handles time travel as they finish Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban.

22.title: Jurassic Park - Part 1
22.plot: Hector Navarro, Amy Vorpahl, and Erin Vail explore the world of Jurassic Park as they cover the first 80 pages of the book.

23.title: Jurassic Park - Part 2
23.plot: Your prehistoric hosts Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro travel deeper into Isla Nublar as they cover up to page 215 in Jurassic Park.

24.title: Jurassic Park - Part 3
24.plot: Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navaro venture deeper into the dinosaur-filled park as they discuss who the actual villain of Jurassic Park could be.

25.title: Jurassic Park - Part 4
25.plot: Hosts Maude Garrett, Hector Navarro, and Amy Vorpahl escape the park and live to tell the tale as they finish Jurassic Park and break down the major differences between the film and book.

26.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire - Part 1
26.plot: Rachel Heine and Hector Navarro adventure back to the wizarding world with Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire. From the Quidditch World Cup, Death Eaters, to other magical schools and more, it's always an adventure with Harry Potter.

1.title: The Haunting of Hill House - Part 1
1.plot: Rachel Heine and Hector Navarro sit down with Maude Garrett (Geekbomb) for this first edition of Alpha Book Club. The book on deck is The Haunting of Hill House.

2.title: The Haunting of Hill House - Part 2
2.plot: Rachel Heine and Hector Navarro sit down with Maude Garrett (Geekbomb) in Alpha Book Club. They continue to talk about The Haunting of Hill House.

3.title: The Haunting of Hill House - Part 3
3.plot: Rachel Heine, Hector Navarro, and Maude Garrett finish The Haunting of Hill House and share their thoughts.

4.title: A Wrinkle in Time - Part 1
4.plot: Rachel Heine and Hector Navarro discuss the new Alpha Book Club choice, A Wrinkle In Time.

5.title: A Wrinkle in Time - Part 2
5.plot: It's time to get our wrinkle on. Rachel Heine and Hector Navarro sit down to talk more about the Madeleine L'Engle title A Wrinkle In Time.

6.title: A Wrinkle in Time - Part 3
6.plot: Rachel Heine and Hector Navarro sit down to discuss the next few chapters of Madeleine L'Engle's popular title, A Wrinkle In Time. Next week, the book will be completed and the audience will vote on the next title.

7.title: A Wrinkle in Time - Part 4
7.plot: Rachel Heine, Nerdist's Editor-In-Chief, joins Hector Navarro, Maude Garret and special guests to read and discuss a different book every month. Most importantly, the Alpha audience is invited to join in the discussion and pick the books.

8.title: The Dark Tower: The Gunslinger - Part 1
8.plot: Rachel Heine, Nerdist's Editor-In-Chief, joins Hector Navarro, Maude Garret and special guests to read and discuss a different book every month. Most importantly, the Alpha audience is invited to join in the discussion and pick the books.

9.title: The Dark Tower: The Gunslinger - Part 2
9.plot: Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro continue their journey into Stephen King's The Gunslinger, the first book of The Dark Tower series.

10.title: The Dark Tower: The Gunslinger - Part 3
10.plot: Hector Navarro and Maude Garrett finish up Stephen King's The Gunslinger, and choose the next book.

1.title: Ready Player One - Part 1
1.plot: Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro sit down together on Alpha Book Club to begin the next title of discussion - Ready Player One by Ernest Cline. Read along with them each week.

2.title: Ready Player One - Part 2
2.plot: Maude Garrett, Hector Navarro, and Rachel Heine sit down for part 2 of their discussion of Ernest Cline's Ready Player One. Follow along and read with them, on Alpha Book Club.

3.title: Ready Player One - Part 3
3.plot: Maude Garrett, Hector Navarro, and Rachel Heine sit down for part 3 of their discussion of Ernest Cline's Ready Player One. Follow along and read with them, on Alpha Book Club.

4.title: Ready Player One - Part 4
4.plot: Maude Garrett, Hector Navarro, and Rachel Heine sit down for part 4 of their discussion of Ernest Cline's Ready Player One.

5.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy - Part 1
5.plot: Rachel Heine, Hector Navarro, and Maude Garrett begin reading The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, by Douglas Adams. Read along with them and join the discussion.

6.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy - Part 2
6.plot: Get your towel ready, it's about to go down. Rachel Heine, Hector Navarro, and Maude Garrett continue on to part 2 of The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, on Alpha Book Club.

7.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy - Part 3
7.plot: Maude Garrett, Hector Navarro, and Rachel Heine sit down to discuss the third portion of the current book of choice, The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.

8.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy - Part 4
8.plot: Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro sit down for Alpha Book Club. This is week 4 of The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, so they finish up the book and reveal the next book of discussion.

9.title: 1984 - Part 1
9.plot: Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro sit down for Alpha Book Club. This is week 4 of The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, so they finish up the book and reveal the next book of discussion.

10.title: 1984 - Part 2
10.plot: Rachel Heine, Nerdist's Editor-In-Chief, joins Hector Navarro, Maude Garret and special guests to read and discuss a different book every month. Most importantly, the Alpha audience is invited to join in the discussion and pick the books.

11.title: 1984 - Part 3
11.plot: Rachel Heine, Maude Garrett, and Hector Navarro continue their 2017 journey into 1984. Join them and read along with the George Orwell classic.

12.title: 1984 - Part 4
12.plot: Rachel Heine, Hector Navarro, and Maude Garrett are your hosts on Alpha Book Club. This week is part 4, the final part, of George Orwell's 1984. And prepare for next week's title, Old Man Logan.

13.title: Old Man Logan
13.plot: Hector Navarro, Rachel Heine, and Maude Garrett present Alpha Book Club. This week is a one-off as they read through Wolverine: Old Man Logan, the graphic novel.

14.title: American Gods - Part 1
14.plot: Rachel Heine, Hector Navarro, and Maude Garrett sit down with a glass of wine and a copy of Neil Gaiman's American Gods. Grab your own copy, sit back, and get reading.

15.title: American Gods - Part 2
15.plot: Welcome to Alpha Book Club. In Maude Garrett's absence, Hector Navarro and Rachel Heine are joined by an Alpha member special guest to continue their discussion of Neil Gaiman's American Gods.

16.title: American Gods - Part 3
16.plot: Maude Garrett, Rachel Heine, and Hector Navarro present Alpha Book Club. The three discuss topics such as Shadow Moon's character, is Loki good or evil, the history of some Gods, and more. Chapter assignment for next week: Chapter 15 through the end of the book.

18.title: Star Wars: Thrawn - Part 1
18.plot: This week on Alpha Book Club, Rachel Heine, Hector Navarro, and Maude Garrett are reading Timothy Zahn's Star Wars: Thrawn. Read along with them and join the discussion. Next week they'll be discussing up to chapter 15, so read up.

19.title: Star Wars: Thrawn - Part 2
19.plot: This week on Alpha Book Club, Rachel Heine, Hector Navarro, and Maude Garrett are reading Timothy Zahn's Star Wars: Thrawn. Read along with them and join the discussion.

20.title: Star Wars: Thrawn - Part 3
20.plot: The reading of Star Wars: Thrawn continues on Alpha Book Club. Maude Garrett, Rachel Heine, and Hector Navarro are joined by guest Amy Radcliffe to discuss the novel. Next week's chapter assignment is Chapter 24 to the end of the book.

21.title: Star Wars: Thrawn - Part 4
21.plot: Rachel Heine, Hector Navarro, and Maude Garrett read the rest of Star Wars: Thrawn with special guest Tyler Boyce. Next week the group will be discussing Wonder Woman: The Hiketeia, in honor of the upcoming film.

22.title: Wonder Woman: The Hiketeia
22.plot: Hector Navarro, Maude Garrett, Rachel Heine, and special guest Jessica Chobot read Wonder Woman: The Hiketeia in honor of the new film. Additionally, the title voted to begin reading next week is The Princess Bride. Read chapters 1 through 3 for next week.

23.title: Princess Bride - Part 1
23.plot: Prepare to die. Maude Garrett, Rachel Heine, and Hector Navarro begin reading The Princess Bride, introducing the various editions and their thoughts on them. Your homework for next week is to read up to page 172.

24.title: The Princess Bride - Part 2
24.plot: On this week of Alpha Book Club, Rachel Heine and Hector Navarro continue their journey into The Princess Bride. Next week's reading assignment is to read up through page 278.

25.title: The Princess Bride - Part 3
25.plot: Hector Navarro is joined by Rachel Heine and Maude Garrett to discuss part 3 of The Princess Bride while they're in costume. Make sure you finish the book for the final discussion next week.

26.title: Princess Bride - Part 4
26.plot: Maude Garrett is joined by Hector Navarro, Rachel Heine, and special guest Cary Elwes for the last episode of The Princess Bride. Alpha Book Club's book for next month is To Kill A Mockingbird and the homework is to read up through chapter 12.

27.title: To Kill a Mockingbird - Part 1
27.plot: Hector Navarro and Maude Garrett begin reading the next choice for Alpha Book Club - To Kill A Mockingbird by Harper Lee. The homework for next week is to read up through chapter 20.

28.title: To Kill a Mockingbird - Part 2
28.plot: Rachel Heine is joined by Hector Navarro, Maude Garrett, and special guest Tal Klein, the winner of the Geek and Sundry Inkshares contest and author of The Punch Escrow. The four continue reading into To Kill A Mockingbird. The assignment for the next episode is to finish the book.

29.title: To Kill a Mockingbird - Part 3
29.plot: Maude Garrett, Rachel Heine, and Hector Navarro are back from San Diego Comic-Con and sit down to discuss the final episode of To Kill A Mockingbird. The next book is Assassin's Apprentice and your homework is to read through Chapter 6.

30.title: Assassin's Apprentice - Part 1
30.plot: Maude Garrett is joined by Rachel Heine and Hector Navarro for Alpha Book Club. This week, they begin Robin Hobb's Assassin's Apprentice. Read up through chapter 12 for next week.

31.title: Assassin's Apprentice - Part 2
31.plot: Hosted by Nerdist's Rachel Heine, Geek and Sundry's Hector Navarro, and Geekbomb's Maude Garrett, Alpha Book Club is a weekly live show where the chosen book of the month is discussed with you, the readers. You can join in the conversation in the chat, dial in to video chat with the hosts directly, and even vote on which book you'd like to read next.

32.title: Assassin's Apprentice - Part 3
32.plot: Maude Garrett, Hector Navarro, Zelda the puppy are continuing their read of Assassin's Apprentice by Robin Hobb. Your homework for next week is to finish the book.

33.title: Assassin's Apprentice - Part 4
33.plot: Hector Navarro is joined by Maude Garrett to finish reading Robin Hobb's Assassin's Apprentice. The book of choice that begins next week is The Martian Chronicles and your homework is to read up through page 95.

34.title: The Martian Chronicles
34.plot: Rachel Heine is joined by Hector Navarro and guest Kyle Anderson for Alpha Book Club. This week they read The Martian Chronicles by Ray Bradbury and next week begins Lois Lowry's The Giver.

35.title: The Giver - Part 1
35.plot: Hosted by Nerdist's Rachel Heine, Geek and Sundry's Hector Navarro, and Geekbomb's Maude Garrett, Alpha Book Club is a weekly live show where the chosen book of the month is discussed with you, the readers. You can join in the conversation in the chat, dial in to video chat with the hosts directly, and even vote on which book you'd like to read next.

36.title: The Giver - Part 2
36.plot: This week on Alpha Book Club, Rachel Heine, Hector Navarro, and Maude Garrett continue reading Lois Lowry's The Giver. The chapter assignment for next week is to read up to the beginning of chapter 17.

37.title: The Giver - Part 3
37.plot: Hosted by Nerdist's Rachel Heine, Geek and Sundry's Hector Navarro, and Geekbomb's Maude Garrett, Alpha Book Club is a weekly live show where the chosen book of the month is discussed with you, the readers. 49.title: The Martian Chronicles - Part 2
49.plot: Rachel Heine is joined by Hector Navarro and Maude Garrett or Alpha Book Club. This week they read The Martian Chronicles by Ray Bradbury.

imdb.plot outline: Alpha Book Club is an online book club hosted on Geek and Sundry's and Nerdist's joint venture platform, Project Alpha (projectalpha.com). Monthly books are chosen by the viewers on Goodreads. During an episode, the hosts discuss a section of the book, speculate on plot elements, discuss personal stories and autobiographical information related to their experiences in reading each book, and will occasionally have a viewer video chat with the hosts, to participate in the discussion. The following books have been discussed, as of May 2018, in chronological order: 2016: The Haunting of Hill House, A Wrinkle in Time, The Dark Tower: The Gunslinger. 2017: Ready Player One, The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, 1984, "Old Man Logan" (comic), American Gods, Star Wars: Thrawn, "Wonder Woman: The Hiketeia" (comic), The Princess Bride, To Kill a Mockingbird, Assassin's Apprentice, The Martian Chronicles, The Giver, Gone Girl, Murder on the Orient Express, Annihilation, and A Series of Unfortunate Events. 2018: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone, Interview with a Vampire, Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, The Golden Compass, and Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban.
imdb.title: Alpha Book Club
plot: _Alpha Book Club_ (qv) is a weekly live book discussion, hosted by Rachel Heine, Hector Navarro, and Maude Garrett. The viewers are encouraged to read a section each week, participate in online chat discussion, and even video chat with the hosts.::ObiWanPEZ

_Alpha Book Club_ (qv) is an online book club hosted on Geek and Sundry's and Nerdist's joint venture platform, Project Alpha (projectalpha.com). Monthly books are chosen by the viewers on Goodreads. During an episode, the hosts discuss a section of the book, speculate on plot elements, discuss personal stories and autobiographical information related to their experiences in reading each book, and will occasionally have a viewer video chat with the hosts, to participate in the discussion. The following books have been discussed, as of May 2018, in chronological order: 2016: The Haunting of Hill House, A Wrinkle in Time, The Dark Tower: The Gunslinger. 2017: Ready Player One, The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, 1984, "Old Man Logan" (comic), American Gods, Star Wars: Thrawn, "Wonder Woman: The Hiketeia" (comic), The Princess Bride, To Kill a Mockingbird, Assassin's Apprentice, The Martian Chronicles, The Giver, Gone Girl, Murder on the Orient Express, Annihilation, and A Series of Unfortunate Events. 2018: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone, Interview with a Vampire, Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, The Golden Compass, and Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban.::ObiWanPEZ
